name: Hold Inside Victoriously
description:
Developed by Furkan Karabudak for Extra Credits Game Jam #4

Firstly, I made this game as hard, but I didn't have enough time to test it.
Difficulty can be unstable, and there can be bugs in the game. I'm so sorry for that.

--- How to Play

You should open the letter in the first scene.

ESC - Exit
F9 - Restart
Space - Shop

Use mouse in Shop menu

You should keep the plug inside socket.
To pull the cable, drag the mouse consecutive in the right direction.

To grab and drag the hammer, just click on it, and to drop it, do the same again.
You should use the hammer for the plug, pick the hammer and click the plug.

Helper Roller works automatic.

After the cable break, you should use the whistler. This will call back the disconnected cable piece.
Then, you should use the sticky tape quickly, before the called cable piece run away again, you should
stick the two pieces of cables quickly. To do that, pick the sticky tape and while holding down the mouse
button, swipe the mouse up and down quickly on the called cable piece.

If you see a warning symbol on the plug or socket, just click to the plug or socket in 8 secs.
